channel.title: Comments on: Simon Reynolds and Ann Powers on the music of 2007

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: It's a pity old Baudrillard could make the Gulf War disappear, but didn't do anything about emo before departing this mortal coil. le sigh.
item.content:encoded: It’s a pity old Baudrillard could make the Gulf War disappear, but didn’t do anything about emo before departing this mortal coil. le sigh.

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: I love the word "simulacrum" - it's a pleasure to read, even more to say.
item.content:encoded: I love the word “simulacrum” – it’s a pleasure to read, even more to say.
